issue.title: set model configuration not work with bullet

content.raw:
It looks like that [service calls `Model::SetJointPositions()`](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/blob/6a8202411e3ea00fc22b197c248caac56f271fd9/gazebo_ros/src/gazebo_ros_api_plugin.cpp#L1695-L1741). I don't know if there is a gazebo CLI api to call that. A model plugin calling this API would be a good way to check if this a gazebo issue.

Here's how to run gazebo without ROS using bullet
```
gazebo -e bullet --verbose
```

It's possible the `gz` command has a similar feature, but I didn't find it. Here is a command to make the joint move using joint controllers.
```
gz joint -m ur10 -j shoulder_pan --pos-t -2
```
content.html:
It looks like that service calls Model::SetJointPositions(). I don't know if there is a gazebo CLI api to call that. A model plugin calling this API would be a good way to check if this a gazebo issue.

Here's how to run gazebo without ROS using bullet

gazebo -e bullet --verbose

It's possible the gz command has a similar feature, but I didn't find it. Here is a command to make the joint move using joint controllers.

gz joint -m ur10 -j shoulder_pan --pos-t -2
